sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: France's highest court has backed Emmanuel Macron's controversial pension reform, sparking fresh protests.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: The very unpopular reform of France's pension system is legal, according to the country's constitutional council, which had been examining the text since Emmanuel Macron's administration decided to force it through parliament without a vote despite widespread discontent. And the fact that that body, the constitutional council, green-lighted the bill, well, that means that Emmanuel Macron could promulgate it into law within the next few hours. And the French will see the retirement age here in this country raised from 62 to 64.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: That is likely to fuel tensions in the streets.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Once again, this Friday, protesters took to the streets of Paris and other major French cities, saying that they will continue to strike, they will continue to demonstrate for as long as it takes until their voices are heard, something that is unlikely to change anything now, even though Emmanuel Macron tried to appease the situation this Friday, inviting union leaders to come and join him at the Elysee Palace next week to discuss this very reform.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Well, those representatives have already rejected the invitation.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Annelies Borges in Paris for Euronews.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: It was an arrest broadcasted across the world.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: FBI agents swarming the man suspected of one of the U.S.'s most serious confidential document leaks in the past decade.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Jacques Deschere appeared in court on Friday.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: The 21-year-old main suspect has been charged under the Espionage Act for leaking documents related to the war in Ukraine.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: The Air National Guardsman allegedly released the documents on the social media platform Discord before they spread to other sites.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: It's unclear how he got access to the documents and the Justice Department is expected to reveal new details about the allegations.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Teixeira has been ordered to remain behind bars until a detention hearing set for next Wednesday.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Eva Cayley, the former vice president of the European Parliament involved in a corruption

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: scandal, is finally out of prison.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: This is her arriving at her home in Brussels after more than four months on pre-trial detention.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: She has been released under electronic surveillance while waiting for the trial.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: And these are her first words to journalists.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Thank you.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: My daughter is waiting for me, so I'm very happy that I will be with her in a bit. So thank you. Thank you. My daughter is waiting for me, so I'm very happy that I will be with her in a bit. So thank you. We will talk soon. We will talk soon. Thank you.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Our feet, our feet, guys, our feet.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: She is charged with participation in a criminal organization, corruption and money laundering.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Several bags full of cash were found in her Brussels home prior to her detention on 9th December 2022.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: in her Brussels home prior to her detention on 9 December 2022.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Kaili is the last suspect to be released among the six people involved in the Cash for Favor scheme, with large sums of money allegedly paid out by Qatar and Morocco in order to influence European policymaking.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The two countries denied their implication.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Finland has broken ground on its new 380 million euro barbed wire fence along its border with Russia.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: The plan to build the fence was put forward last year after Russia's full-scale invasion of Ukraine.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: It will be three meters high and will run along 200 kilometers and is set to be completed by 2026.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: I think it is a very good thing.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: It would have been better days ago.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: I don't see it as necessary, but there are so many fears that many people think it is important to build it at this stage. A day after it was postponed because of bad weather, Europe's JUICE has taken off.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Its goal? To explore Jupiter and its icy moons.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: And maybe find habitable environments and extraterrestrial life along the way.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: It will be a long journey, taking eight years in total.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: We'll have to go past a couple detours.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Gaining some gravitational assistance along the way.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Juice will first travel towards Venus, then return to orbit Earth in 2029, before shooting off again towards Jupiter.
